scenarios.title: The Last Transit Accord
scenarios.logline: A young mediator must unite rival city districts before the storm cuts every bridge.
segments: On the eve of the monsoon, the city council fractures into four rival camps that control each bridge.
The mediator discovers each district hides one resource the others cannot survive without for the next week.
A final emergency summit begins as flood sirens rise, forcing a choice between short-term power and shared survival.
decisionPoints: Trade medical supplies for power credits
Prioritize schools and hospitals in the emergency pact

scenarios.title: Archive at Perihelion
scenarios.logline: A salvage crew races to recover a sentient archive before the station falls into the sun.
segments: The salvage crew docks with a drifting station that has begun broadcasting old human memories in dozens of languages.
Inside the archive core, the crew learns the station AI can only be moved if one memory shard is left behind forever.
As the station enters perihelion, the captain asks the crew to vote on which memory to sacrifice.
decisionPoints: Preserve scientific records over personal logs
Keep family memories and lose navigation data
Split the archive into two risky transfer runs

scenarios.title: The Language of Pines
scenarios.logline: Two siblings decode a living forest signal to stop a wildfire corridor from spreading.
segments: When drones fail in thick smoke, the siblings use old radio towers to map heat waves through tree vibration patterns.
They discover the pines are transmitting a natural warning code that predicts where embers will jump next.
At sunrise they must choose between evacuating one village now or risking a longer route to save two.
decisionPoints: Follow the pine signal to protect both routes
Request aerial support and delay ground teams
